episodes.title: How I Almost Lost My Life in This Cult-Like Church
episodes.description: I never thought it could happen to me. This video shares my harrowing true story of how a seemingly spiritual community turned into a cult-like church that nearly cost me everything – my peace, my health, my job, and even my life. My hope is that by sharing my journey, I can empower others to avoid similar pitfalls and prioritize their well-being.

episodes.title: My Experience Inside A Cult Church In Lagos
episodes.description: In this raw honest video, Amarachi shares her personal story of what it was like inside a church that, to her, operated like a cult. This isn't just her story; it's a conversation about the subtle — and sometimes not-so-subtle - ways religious groups can become high-control environments. If you've ever felt uneasy about a spiritual community or are curious about cult dynamics, this video is for you.
